description:
While at Oda`s castle, a man called Saru, whose name is actually Kinoshita Hideyoshi, appears before her. He keeps bugging her to him ninja techniques and another Oda subordinate, Mori Yoshinari, who is a master of the spear, asks her to spar with him. What does Chidori do?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La famille Oda et de joyeux compagnons
The Oda Clan and Their Merry Friends
織田家とゆかいな仲間たち
